message.body: You find yourself in a dark forest, surrounded by towering trees and the sound of birdsong.
A gnarled tree branch extends towards you, whispering secrets in your ear.

options.longText: As I listen closer, I make out faint whispers of secrets and forgotten tales of brave adventurers and mystical creatures.
I am not afraid of the unknown and am ready to face any challenges that come my way.

message.body: The tree whispers secrets of ancient civilizations and forgotten gods.

options.text: I am ready to hear more secrets.
options.longText: The tree reveals tales of lost treasures, mystical creatures, and hidden pathways.

message.body: You are standing at a crossroads, with two paths leading away.

options.text: I choose the path to the left.
options.longText: You follow the path to the left, encountering a hidden waterfall and a talking animal.

options.text: I choose the path to the right.
options.longText: You follow the path to the right, discovering a hidden cave and a mystical portal.

message.body: You find yourself in a hidden waterfall surrounded by lush vegetation.
A talking animal guides you through the waterfall and into a hidden sanctuary.

options.text: I am grateful for the guidance.
options.longText: The talking animal offers assistance and protection, leading you to safety.

message.body: You discover a hidden cave with mystical symbols etched on its walls.
A mystical portal transports you to a distant land.

options.longText: You step through the portal, embarking on a new adventure in a foreign land.

message.body: Congratulations! You have completed your adventure.
